title: New: Wham! – Last Christmas (Slugabed Ruined It)
body: Ah **[Slugabed](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12735-mpfree-slugabed-kittens/ "MPfree: Slugabed – Kittens")**, from now on when I think of Christmas, i’ll forever think of you. He’s only gone at remixed the **Wham!** classic, ‘_Last Christmas_’, into the most diabolical set of sounds known to man. Well done sir, bloody well done.

excerpt.full: Ah Slugabed, from now on when I think of Christmas, i’ll forever think of you. He’s only gone at remixed the Wham! classic, ‘Last Christmas’, into the most diabolical set of sounds known to man. Well done sir, bloody well done.
excerpt.short: Ah Slugabed, from now on when I think of Christmas, i'll forever think of you.
